page.title: 16My school day, in Patchway
page.content: I woke up, got dressed, made my bed and ate my breakfast. I got ready and set off. I kissed my mum and went in. We went into the classroom then in 5 minutes the bell rang for service. Sharon and I asked Sir if we could clean out the paint cupboard. He said "Yes" so the others went into service and we started right away. Then the class came back. We did Maths until break time. After we had English. At dinner time I went home. After dinner we went to music, then P.E. then we went to the school library. We all changed our library books and read. Then we went back to class and did some more reading and writing. The bell went to go home. I watched T.V. and had my tea. After I watched "Top of the Pops" I went to bed, read, and went to sleep.
